attributes.review: I hate this app because it’s so laggy, and there are way to many ads. Not to mention, I hate trump. He’s a horrible person and deserves absolutely nothing :). But seriously I didn’t even go on this app and I already hate it.
attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: after i downloaded this horrible app donald trump himself came to my house. i was surprised to see him when i opened my front door and i was so happy to see my amazing president, but after that everything went downhill. he kicked me in my stomach, called me a f*gg*t, then he stole on my money, he spit on me, and then he started galloping away. this was a very traumatic experience for me. i get ptsd everytime i see the color orange now. but other than that , the app is bad. god bless 🙏🏻😊❤️
attributes.title: ruined my life 😿

attributes.review: my phone won’t stop crashing because of this app. i downloaded it to see what his campaign really stood for, and his point of view. this is the worst app ever, and my phone crashed a good 3 or 4 times. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. (my phone is definitely not old.)
This app keeps making my phone crash, it’s a seven plus and it shouldn’t be doing that, I’ve tried deleting and redownloading, restarting my phone and still nothing. I’m very disappointed.
attributes.title: Crashes

attributes.review: This app started glitching almost as soon as my info was entered. Like what in the world is this. Everything on my phone began to run slow and shut down even after I deleted this junk app.
attributes.title: ✨What am I even on✨

attributes.review: This big old racist orange rat decides to delete the most popular app in the world while also making racist tweets thinking that he still gonna have supporters well look at that this app got one star for a reason. 👏🤯👏
attributes.title: This is the worst app

attributes.review: No matter how you look at it this app is the worst thing to happen to man kind sense the mans election. This Dosent deserve to be on the App Store, instead it should be replaced with good, family friendly apps such as our beloved tic tak.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible in every way

attributes.review: First I thought this was a app where you make help oranges grow but turns out when I opened there was a walking orange very scary do not recommend for children or anybody walking on this earth do not get this app unless you want to be scared for life
attributes.userName: tiktok is the best trump sucs
attributes.title: Scam
